scripts.prep: yarn && yarn lerna bootstrap && yarn lerna run build
scripts.build-docs: yarn copy-readmes && cd packages/dataparcels-docs && yarn build-docs
scripts.copy-readmes: cp README.md packages/dataparcels/README.md && cp README.md packages/react-dataparcels/README.md
scripts.reinstall: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf packages/*/node_modules && yarn prep
